article_title: GE Retirees Seek 'Greater Justice' on Health Care in Class-Action Suit
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: Two retired employees suing General Electric (GE) over cuts to their health care coverage are seeking class-action status for their complaint, which asks that their previous benefits be reinstated.
article_metadata.author: James Passeri
